creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black satin shoe body with side lining only; upturned toe and lined heel flap; embroidered floral design at sides and toe in satin stitch in pink, red, yellow, orange, green; reinforced sole (paper and fabric?) stitched throughout with heavy cord
title: Pair of Shoes
